properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 9 at 11:54AM AST until February 11 at 2:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Rough and hazardous marine conditions will prevail the next few
days...

.A strong surface high pressure across the central Atlantic will
yield a fresh to locally strong easterly wind flow across the
regional waters, creating hazardous marine conditions through at
least late Monday night.

* WHAT...East winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
increasing seas at 5 to 7 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 2 PM Monday to 2 AM AST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MONDAY TO 2 AM AST TUESDAY
